summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent in New York's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit requesting assistance with a taint review for the Epstein case. The document highlights ongoing investigative work related to evidence handling in 2020.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
persons.context: The author of the email, requesting assistance with a taint review for the Epstein case from the New York FBI office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit.

connections.person1: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
connections.description: The Special Agent is requesting investigative assistance (taint review) from MI, indicating a professional working relationship within law enforcement.

events.title: Request for Taint Review Assistance
events.description: An FBI Special Agent from New York sends an email requesting assistance with a taint review for the Epstein case.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking

keyFacts: As of June 17, 2020, the FBI's New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit was actively working on the Epstein case.
The investigation required a 'taint review', a legal procedure to separate privileged from non-privileged material in evidence.
The communication indicates ongoing inter-agency or intra-agency coordination on the case years after Epstein's arrest and death.
